content: choose whatever hook translates best for your yarn choice this will give you the best drape and stitch gauge stitches/abbreviations used- **us terminology st stitch chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet pop popcorn 5 double_crochet popcorn f/o finish or fasten_off numbers in brackets at row ends gives you the final stitch count for that row
